author: fnathan
title: Owen Coyle sacked by struggling Blackburn Rovers after less than a season in charge at Ewood Park
text:
ow no Owen Coyle sacked by struggling Blackburn Rovers after less than a season in charge at Ewood Park 
Rovers are second bottom of the Championship, three points from safety... but acquitted themselves well in FA Cup defeat to Manchester United last weekend By FRED NATHAN and ALAN NIXON 21st February 2017, 3:40 pm
